name: Apathy
description:
Apathy is a skill-based movement and exploration adventure with a peaceful atmospheric ambience. Throughout Apathy you will progress through a sequence of challenges that put your movement and thinking skills to the test. Failing a challenge means losing progress.

Apathy revolves around the famous bunnyhop and strafe based movement mechanics with some additional mechanics to make gameplay more interesting. Jump on blocks, avoid pits, activate boosters to reach new platforms. Discover new secrets and shortcuts.

Progress made will be saved so you can stop playing and pick up and continue where you left off at any time. Upon completing Apathy, your time will be recorded and stacked up against everybody else who has also completed Apathy. If you are up for the challenge, practice the best routes and try to earn a respectable rank on the leaderboard!

Be sure to invite your friends, because you can play together and explore even more multiplayer features in the world of Apathy!
